Description:
Detects all variations of obfuscated powershell IEX invocation code generated by Invoke-Obfuscation framework from the following code block \u2014

Author: Daniel Bohannon (@Mandiant/@FireEye), oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Obfuscated IEX Invocation - PowerShell
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where scriptblocktext re '\$PSHome\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$PSHome\[' and scriptblocktext re '\$ShellId\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$ShellId\[' and scriptblocktext re '\$env:Public\[\s*\d{1,3}\s*\]\s*\+\s*\$env:Public\[' and scriptblocktext re '\$env:ComSpec\[(\s*\d{1,3}\s*,){2}' and scriptblocktext re '\*mdr\*\W\s*\)\.Name' and scriptblocktext re '\$VerbosePreference\.ToString\('
